data.name: KF2 - Season Pass 2022
data.detailed_description:
Expand your repertoire of Zed destruction in Killing Floor 2 with this year’s Armory Season Pass! The most dosh-efficient way to gain immediate access to all 6 upcoming 2022 weapons as they release throughout the year.

Purchase immediately includes 2 brand new weapons released with the Summer 2022 Update!
- Reducto Ray Weapon Bundle
- Sentinel Weapon Bundle
- Both weapon bundles come with 5 unique weapon skins each

Additionally, the Killing Floor 2 Armory Season Pass 2 includes access to the upcoming Weapon Bundles scheduled as follows:
- 2 Weapons for Fall 2022
- Both Fall weapon bundles come with 5 unique weapon skins each
- 2 Weapons for Winter 2022
- Both Winter weapon bundles come with 5 unique weapon skins each

data.short_description: Expand your repertoire of Zed destruction in Killing Floor 2 with this year’s Armory Season Pass! The most dosh-efficient way to gain immediate access to all 6 upcoming 2022 weapons as they release throughout the year.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7 64-bit, Win8/8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66GHz or Phenom II X2 545
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 or Radeon HD 4830
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: IntelHD Integrated Graphics Chips, 32-bit Operating Systems, NVIDIA ® FleX features require a GeForce ® GTX™ 770 or higher (GeForce ® GTX™ 980 recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad Q9550 2.83GHz or Phenom II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA ® FleX features require a GeForce ® GTX™ 770 or higher (GeForce ® GTX™ 980 recommended)

data.legal_notice: Killing Floor ©2009-2017 by Tripwire Interactive. Unreal® is a registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. Unreal® Engine, ©1998-2017, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Killing Floor 2 features intense violence, blood and gore that includes decapitation or dismemberment. Combat is held with both realistic and futuristic weaponry and frequently have large explosions and realistic gunfire; certain attacks are highlighted by slow-motion effects.
